rukus.text: Bͻ wo Wura Nyankopͻn a Ɔbͻͻ adeε no din na kenkan
(Wo Wura Nyankopͻn a) Ɔbͻͻ onipa firii mogya a abͻ toa mu
Kenkan na wo Wura Nyankopͻn ne Adom Hene no
Ɔno na Ɔde twerεdua kyerε adeε
Daabi, nokorε sε onipa te atua
Nokorε sε, wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ ne (onipa) nnkyi
(Nyankopͻn) dͻnkͻ no kwan εberε a ɔrefrɛ Nyame
W’ahunu sε saa (nipa) no wͻ ͻkwan tenenee so
Anaasε ͻhyε (amanfoͻ) sε wͻ’nsuro Nyame nyε ahwεyie
W’ahunu sε obu (Nokorε) no sε atorͻsεm dane n’akyi dema
Daabi, sε w’annyae a, Yε’bεsͻ n’apampamu puaa no mu
Na Yε’bεfrε (Amanehunu gya no mu Abͻfoͻ) Zabaaniya
Daabi, (Nkͻmhyεni) entie no, na mmom wodeε fa w’anim butu fͻm na twe woho bεn (Onyankopͻn)
